verses.verse: Do We Begin <WG756> Again <WG3825> Ourselves <WG1438> To Commend? <WG4921> <WG1487> Unless <WG3361> We Need, <WG5535> As <WG5613> Some, <WG5100> Commendatory <WG4956> Epistles <WG1992> To <WG4314> You, <WG5209> Or <WG2228> From <WG1537> You <WG5216> Commendatory Ones? <WG4956>

Confidence <WG4006> And <WG1161> Such <WG5108> Have We <WG2192> Through <WG1223> The <WG3588> Christ <WG5547> Towards <WG4314> <WG3588> God : <WG2316>

Not <WG3756> That <WG3754> Competent <WG2425> We Are <WG2070> ' From <WG575> Ourselves <WG1438> To Reckon <WG3049> Anything <WG5100> As <WG5613> Of <WG1537> Ourselves, <WG1438> ' But <WG235> <WG3588> <WG2426> Our Competency <WG2257> Is Of <WG1537> <WG3588> God; <WG2316>

Who <WG3739> Also <WG2532> Made Competent <WG2427> Us As <WG2248> Servants <WG1249> Of A New <WG2537> Covenant; <WG1242> Not <WG3756> Of Letter, <WG1121> But <WG235> Of Spirit; <WG4151> <WG3588> For The <WG1063> Letter <WG1121>, Kills, <WG615> <WG3588> But The <WG1161> Spirit <WG4151> Quickens. <WG2227>

<WG1487> But If <WG1161> The <WG3588> Service <WG1248> <WG3588> Of Death <WG2288> In <WG1722> Letters, <WG1121> Having Been Engraven <WG1795> In <WG1722> Stones, <WG3037> Was Produced <WG1096> With <WG1722> Glory, <WG1391> So As <WG5620> <WG3361> Not To Be Able To <WG1410> Look Intently <WG816> The <WG3588> Children <WG5207> Of Israel <WG2474> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Face <WG4383> Of Moses, <WG3475> On Account Of <WG1223> The <WG3588> Glory <WG1391> <WG3588> <WG4383> Of His Face, <WG846> Which <WG3588> Is Being Annulled; <WG2673>
How <WG4459> Not <WG3780> Rather <WG3123> The <WG3588> Service <WG1248> Of The <WG3588> Spirit <WG4151> Shall Be <WG2071> In <WG1722> Glory? <WG1391>

<WG1487> For If <WG1063> The <WG3588> Service <WG1248> <WG3588> Of Condemnation Be <WG2633> Glory, <WG1391> Much <WG4183> Rather <WG3123> Abounds <WG4052> The <WG3588> Service <WG1248> <WG3588> Of Righteousness <WG1343> In <WG1722> Glory. <WG1391>

<WG2532> For Even <WG1063> Neither <WG3761> Has Been Made Glorious <WG1392> That Which <WG3588> Has Been Made Glorious <WG1392> In <WG1722> This <WG5129> <WG3588> Respect, <WG3313> On Account Of <WG1752> The <WG3588> Surpassing <WG5235> Glory. <WG1391>

<WG1487> For If <WG1063> That Which <WG3588> Is Being Annulled Was <WG2673> Through <WG1223> Glory, <WG1391> Much <WG4183> Rather <WG3123> That Which <WG3588> Remains Is <WG3306> In <WG1722> Glory. <WG1391>
Having <WG2192> Therefore <WG3767> Such <WG5108> Hope, <WG1680> Much <WG4183> Boldness <WG3954> We Use : <WG5530>

And <WG2532> Not <WG3756> According As <WG2509> Moses <WG3475> Put <WG5087> A Veil <WG2571> On <WG1909> The <WG3588> Face <WG4383>, Of Himself, <WG1438> For <WG4314> <WG3588> Not <WG3361> To Look Intensity <WG816> The <WG3588> Sons <WG5207> Of Israel <WG2474> To <WG1519> The <WG3588> End <WG5056> At That <WG3588> Being Annulled. <WG2673>

' But <WG235> Were Hardened <WG4456> <WG3588> <WG3540> Their Thoughts, <WG846> <WG891> For Unto <WG1063> The <WG3588> Present <WG4594> The <WG3588> Same <WG846> Veil <WG2571> At <WG1909> The <WG3588> Reading <WG320> Of The <WG3588> Old <WG3820> Covenant <WG1242> Remains, <WG3306> Not <WG3361> Uncovered, <WG343> <WG3739> Which <WG5100> In <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Is Being Annulled. <WG2673>
' But <WG235> Unto <WG2193> This Day, <WG4594> When <WG2259> Is Read <WG314>, Moses, <WG3475> A Veil <WG2571> Upon <WG1909> <WG3588> <WG2588> Their Heart <WG846> Lies. <WG2749>
<WG2259> ' <WG1161> But When <WG302> It Shail Have Turned <WG1994> To The <WG4314> Lord, <WG2962> Is Taken Away <WG4014> The <WG3588> Veil. <WG2571>
<WG3588> Now The <WG1161> Lord <WG2962> The <WG3588> Spirit <WG4151> Is; <WG2076> <WG3757> And Where <WG1161> The <WG3588> Spirit <WG4151> Of The Lord Is, <WG2962> There Is <WG1563> Freedom. <WG1657>

<WG2249> But We <WG1161> All <WG3956> With Uncovered <WG343> Face <WG4383> The <WG3588> Glory <WG1391> Of The Lord <WG2962> Beholding As In A Mirror, To <WG2734> The <WG3588> Same <WG846> Image <WG1504> Are Being Transformed <WG3339> From <WG575> Glory <WG1391> To <WG1519> Glory, <WG1391> Even As <WG2509> From The <WG575> Lord The <WG2962> Spirit. <WG4151>
